page.title: Star Trek Wrath of Gems Wikia

revision.text:
==Welcome to the Star Trek Wrath of Gems Wikia== Star Trek Wrath of Gems is a mobile game for iOS and android with a simple match-the-gems gameplay. However ST:WoG has lots of other details to explore and understand. This wikia is hopefully a way to help increase that understanding. ==NOTICE== The game has reached EOL... effective this morning (2018-09-14) all of the optional recruit and monetary purchase abilities were removed... there are still 60 days available to play with the game - but after that, they will probably take-down their servers and so it (the game) will be non-functional... For further discussions about this main-page, please see [[Talk:Star Trek Wrath of Gems Wikia]]... [[File:Stwog-eol.png]]
==Goals== Here are a set of goals, that '''I''' have had for this wikia/fandom space... # Document all of the Playable Characters and Ships in the Game #* status: afaict, all items are in the data-modules, but the code to auto-populate the ships is still in development... all the crew pages are accessible via the collections top-menu or searching or ... #* status-EOL: all the character and starship data can be perused by looking, altho i did not get my Tier-3 items completed... if you have any additional information for those items, please add them to the appropriate page - which can be found from [[Level165]] ... tyvm... # Describe how the game works for newer/unfamiliar players #* status: this still needs a LOT of work... i started some of the writeups in the gameplay top-menu but have not fleshed them out... in particular it has been difficult to determine what is best needed... so please go to [[Questions]] and edit the page, so that i (or someone else) can help figure out what would be most beneficial to work on next... # Provide a place for players of the game to communicate ## to each other, for instance - regarding Alliances... ## to the universe, for instance - to document their current Archive-Collection... ## to ???, for instance - to ask for game-features or ??? #* status: feel free to send messages any way that makes sense - since right now, afaict, i (harold) am the only person around most of the time... :-) The next question is, what would '''YOU''' like from this space... # At this point, there are All-{{#invoke:CommonLists | main | c | count0 }} characters, All-{{#invoke:CommonLists | main | s | count0 }} starships, All-10/10 storylines, All-{{#invoke:EventDates | main | count0 }} events, and NONE-0/??? arenas that have some documentation... #* See: [[Hero table]] or [[:Template:TiermaxALL]] to see the list of characters and starships... #* See: [[:Category:Story TOS]] and [[:Category:Story TNG]] for the currently documented details of the two storylines... #* See: [[Events]] for the currently-known events... # Looking at the [[Calendar]], maybe it is time to start documenting the arenas ? # The game seems to take forever to grind up each character/ship to higher levels - are there any shortcuts (besides spending a whole lot of money) available to make things go faster ? # Maybe there is something that this space can become - that just needs the outside input of a new user like YOU to make it happen... # There might not be much there, but [[tbd...]] has a link to [[project:spoilers]]... As the experts at wikipedia would say [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Be_bold Be Bold] !!! [[User:Hfelton|Hfelton]] ([[User talk:Hfelton|talk]]) 10:43, May 12, 2017 (UTC) ==Other References== # [http://startrekwrathofgems.generamobile.com Exact-Game's Webfront] ## [https://generagames.helpshift.com/a/star-trek/ Exact-Game's Help Area] ## [https://www.reddit.com/r/StarTrekWrathofGems/ Reddit Discussions] # [https://generagames.com/ Genera-Games = Creator] # [http://www.cbsinteractive.com/ CBS-Paramount-StarTrek = Licensor] # [https://www.facebook.com/StarTrekWOG/ Facebook News/Fansite] # [https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/star-trek-wrath-of-gems/id959515619 Apple Play Store] # [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.gi.startrek Google Play Store] {{Navbox}}
